property_tycoon.model

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • property_tycoon.model.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a player. An array of players is passed in to the board class upon initialisation of a board. Players have three properties; an integer amount of cash, a list of properties that they own and a list of cards that they own. A string description of the player can also be returned.
    Version:
    08/04/2018
    Author:
    meme-team

    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

    • Method Detail

      • buy

        public void buy(Property property)
        Changes ownership of the passed in property from the bank to this player. Reduces this player's cash by the corresponding amount.
        Parameters:
        property - The property that is to get added to this player's array of properties.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the passed in property is null.
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the player doesn't have enough cash to buy the passed in property.

      • cashProperty

        public javafx.beans.property.ReadOnlyIntegerProperty cashProperty()
        Returns a non modifiable, read only object of the player's cash.
        See Also:
        getCash()

      • downgrade

        public void downgrade(Property property)
        Increases the cash owned by this player by the amount it pays to downgrade the passed in property.
        Parameters:
        property - The property to be downgraded by this player.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the passed in property is not currently owned by this player.

      • draw

        public void draw(Card.Group from)
        Adds a card from the passed in card group to this player's hand.
        Parameters:
        from - The card group from which the card will be drawn.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the card group is a null object.

      • getCards

        public javafx.collections.ObservableList<Card> getCards()
        Returns an unmodifiable list of the cards currently owned by this player.
        Returns:
        The list of cards this player owns.

      • getCash

        public int getCash()
        Returns the amount of cash the player currently owns.
        Returns:
        An integer value representing the player's current cash.

      • getColor

        public javafx.scene.paint.Color getColor()
        Returns this player's chosen color.
        Returns:
        The color associated with this player.

      • getController

        public Player.Controller getController()
        Returns the Controller object associated with this player. Controllers are assigned at game start.
        Returns:
        The controller object for this player.

      • getDescription

        public java.lang.String getDescription()
        Returns a description of this player object.
        Returns:
        A string description of this player.

      • getProperties

        public javafx.collections.ObservableList<Property> getProperties()
        Returns a list of properties currently owned by this player. This list cannot be modified upon access by this method.
        Returns:
        The list of properties this player owns.

      • isControlled

        public boolean isControlled()
        Indicates whether this player has a controller assigned to it.
        Returns:
        A boolean indicating if this player has a controller object associated with it.

      • mortgage

        public void mortgage(Property property)
        Changes the state of the passed in property to be mortgaged. Increases the player's cash by the corresponding amount.
        Parameters:
        property - The property to be mortgaged by this player.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the passed in property is null.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the passed in property is not currently owned by this player.

      • payRent

        public void payRent(Property on,
                    int diceValue)
        Transfers cash from this player to the passed in property's owner. Rent is determined by the property's group, its level and the dice roll. Dice roll must be included since utilities rely on this information.
        Parameters:
        on - The property whose owner must be paid rent.
        diceValue - The dice value this player object rolled to land on the property.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the passed in player is null.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the passed in property doesn't have an owner.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if this player doesn't have enough cash to pay rent.

      • sell

        public void sell(Property property)
        Removes ownership of the passed in property from this player. Increases this player's cash by the corresponding amount.
        Parameters:
        property - The property to be removed from this player's property array.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the passed in property is null.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the passed in property is not currently owned by this player.

      • unmortgage

        public void unmortgage(Property property)
        Changes the state of the passed in property to be unmortgaged. Decreases the player's cash by the corresponding amount.
        Parameters:
        property - The property to be mortgaged by this player.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the passed in property is not currently owned by this player.
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the player doesn't have enough cash to unmortgage the passed in property.

      • upgrade

        public void upgrade(Property property)
        Reduces the cash owned by this player by the amount it costs to upgrade the passed in property.
        Parameters:
        property - The property to be upgraded by this player.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the passed in property is not currently owned by this player.
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the player doesn't have enough cash to upgrade the passed in property.

      • use

        public void use(Card card)
        Executes the associated action of the passed in card by calling the alternate use() method. Since this method is only called when the passed in card has a single action, the index of the action is 0.
        Parameters:
        card - The card to be used by this player.

      • use

        public void use(Card card,
                int action)
        Executes the passed in action of the passed in card. Removes the card from this player's possession.
        Parameters:
        card - The card to be used by this player.
        action - The action to be executed by the card.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the card is a null object.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the passed in card is not currently owned by this player.
